feature.label: Swamp_eclipse_plugin
feature.description:
This feature contains the SWAMP Eclipse plug-in which can be used to submit assessments to the Software Assurance Marketplace (SWAMP) and to view the results of those assessments in the Eclipse IDE.
The following tools are available on the SWAMP for assessing Java and C/C++ source code: Checkstyle, Clang Static Analyzer, Cppcheck, Error Prone, FindBugs, GCC, GrammaTech CodeSonar, OWASP Dependency Check, PMD, Parasoft C/C++test, Parasoft Jtest.
